mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Texas Centennial Central Exposition (1936 : Dallas, Tex.)
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Texas Bowl
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photograph taken from the back of the amphitheatre known as the Texas Bowl in Dallas, Texas. On stage there is a set that looks like constructed homes in a Native American style. The stage is situated at the base of a small hill. On the right hand side behind the stage there is a car
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
